11 February - Sierra Vista Ubuntu Hour hosted by Rex Bouwense
* 13 attendees (1 new person)
* Ubuntu 20.04.2 was released on 05 February 2021.  Our install media has been updated accordingly.
* Ubuntu will be changing installers.  Probably will be effective with the 21.10 release.
* Discussed 3-D printers.
* A member asked if there would be any known problems with dual booting Apple OS with Ubuntu on a 2017 Apple laptop.  A discussion followed.  There are apparently many known problems even after disabling the security chip.  You manually have to add the wifi driver and sometimes drives for sound, webcam, bluetooth, keyboard, and touchpad.  The Arch Wiki has a a list of things to do when attempting to install a Linux system on a newer Apple laptop.
* Mike gave an update on his Bisbee project.  His grant has been approved locally, however our install on his computers is still on hold.
* Valentine gifts were passed out to all of those in attendance.
